name: King's Cup - The online multiplayer drinking game
name_original: King's Cup - The online multiplayer drinking game
description:
King's Cup is a drinking game played online with friends. A player pulls a card from the card circle and places it on top of the cup in the center face side up. Based on the card that player or all players must take an action, usually leading to one or more people taking a drink.   It is recommend to have 3 or more players before starting the game and to use a VoIP chatting service like Discord.

Controls

  • Click and drag to move a card (release it over the cup to flip)
  • Press W or Up arrow to point to heaven (7 is heaven)
  • Right click to change your cursor to a thumbs up 👍
    • Thumb Master can do this at any point (after pulling a 5)
    • All other players must thumbs up after the Thumb Master 
  • Click your name to change it (you are given a random one automatically)
  • Escape to open the menu/exit a game

Joining and Creating Games

  • Select New Game from main menu to start a new game
    • Once the server is ready you can share the game code
    • Click the game code in the bottom left to copy it to your clipboard
  • Enter a game code and select Join Game to join your friends in an existing game
